amendment.description: Amendment includes energy transportation in the list of considerations for the Energy Security Valuation report.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Garamendi amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Garamendi amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. Garamendi.
